title: How did Expand Energy Corporation's quarterly Capex figures (excluding the productive capacity program) compare to management guidance (at midpoint) for the last 3 quarters. Use guidance from the previous quarter's management guidance when comparing and format answer as % Beat or % Miss with a beat representing actual capex being lower and vice-versa for a miss. Round percentage to 2 decimal places.
description:
1. Identify the necessary formula to determine the beat or miss of actual compared to guided figures. For this question, it is: (Actual Figure/Guided Figure)-1 with the output being expressed as a percentage out to two decimal places
 2. Determine the formula needed to find the midpoint in management guidance which is (upper bound of guidance + lower bound of guidance)/2
 
 3. Retrieve Q1 2025 actual (denoted as 1Q25A) Total Base Capital Expenditures from the Q1 2025 Outlook document: $662
 4. Retrieve and calculate the midpoint of Q1 2025 guided (denoted as 1Q25E) Total Base Capital Expenditures from the Q4 2024 Outlook document: $712.5 = (675+750)/2
 5. Compute the % Beat or % Miss for Q1 2025 according to the formula stated in step 1: -7.09% or 7.09% Beat = 662/712.5-1
 
 6. Retrieve Q2 2025 actual (denoted as 2Q25A) Total Base Capital Expenditures from the Q2 2025 Outlook document : $655
 7. Retrieve and calculate the midpoint of Q2 2025 guided (denoted as 2Q25E) Total Base Capital Expenditures from the Q1 2025 Outlook document: $762.5 = (725+800)/2
 8. Compute the % Beat or % Miss for Q2 2025 according to the formula stated in step 1: -14.10% or 14.10% Beat = 655/762.5-1
 
 9. Retrieve Q3 2025 actual (denoted as 3Q25A) Total Base Capital Expenditures from the Q3 2025 Outlook document: $635 
 10. Retrieve and calculate the midpoint of Q3 2025 guided (denoted as 3Q25E) Total Base Capital Expenditures from the Q2 2025 Outlook document: $700 = (660+740)/2
 11. Compute the % Beat or % Miss for Q3 2025 according to the formula stated in step 1: -9.29% or 9.29% Beat = 635/700-1

rubric.criteria: Used correct formula for beat/miss: (Actual Figure/Guided Figure)-1, expressed as a percentage rounded to 2 decimal places
Used correct formula for guidance midpoint: (upper bound of guidance + lower bound of guidance)/2
Retrieved correct 1Q25 actual Total Base Capital Expenditures: $662
Used correct formula and figures to calculate 1Q25 guided midpoint Total Base Capital Expenditures: $712.5, calculated as (675+750)/2
Used correct formula and figures to calculate 1Q25 % Beat/Miss: -7.09% (7.09% Beat), calculation shown as 662/712.5-1
Retrieved correct 2Q25 actual Total Base Capital Expenditures: $655
Used correct formula and figures to calculate 2Q25 guided midpoint Total Base Capital Expenditures = $762.5, calculated as (725+800)/2
Used correct formula and figures to calculate 2Q25 % Beat/Miss = -14.10% (14.10% Beat), calculation shown as 655/762.5-1
Retrieved correct 3Q25 actual Total Base Capital Expenditures = $635
Used correct formula and figures to calculate 3Q25 guided midpoint Total Base Capital Expenditures = $700, calculated as (660+740)/2
Used correct formula and figures to calculate 3Q25 % Beat/Miss = -9.29% (9.29% Beat), calculation shown as 635/700-1
